# gxg-menu

<!-- Auto Generated Below -->

## Properties

| Property       | Attribute        | Description                                                                                         | Type      | Default     |
| -------------- | ---------------- | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | --------- | ----------- |
| `ellipsis`     | `ellipsis`       | Prevents the menu-item's text from wrapping into more than one line, adding an ellipsis at the end. | `boolean` | `true`      |
| `hidden`       | `hidden`         | Hides or show the menu with an animation                                                            | `boolean` | `true`      |
| `hideOnSelect` | `hide-on-select` | Hides the menu when an item is selected.                                                            | `boolean` | `true`      |
| `menuTitle`    | `menu-title`     | The menu title                                                                                      | `string`  | `undefined` |
| `tabs`         | `tabs`           | Provide this attribute if you are using this menu on the tabs component                             | `boolean` | `undefined` |

| `"inner-wrapper"` |             |
| `"lists-wrapper"` |             |
| `"outer-wrapper"` |             |
| `"title"`         |             |
